alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Chautauqua County through 400 PM EDT... At 323 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mayville, or 18 miles southwest of Fredonia. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds up to of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Westfield, Mayville, Findley Lake, Chautauqua Institution, Chautauqua, Ripley, Mina, Sherman, Ripley Beach, Barcelona, and Stedman Corners. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 60 and 61. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
